attributes.title: ü•∞‚ú®üßöIt‚Äôs a no from meüòçüòä‚ú®
attributes.review:
PROLOGUE
Two households, both alike in dignity, 
In fair Verona, where we lay our scene,
From ancient grudge break to new mutiny, Where civil blood makes civil hands unclean. From forth the fatal loins of these two foes
A pair of star-cross'd lovers take their life,
Whose misadventured piteous overthrows 
Doth with their death bury their parents'strife.
The fearful passage of their death-mark'd love,
And the continuance of their parents' rage,
Which, but their children's end, naught could remove, Is now the two hours' traffic of our stage.
The which if you with patient ears attend,
What here shall miss, our toil shall strive to mend.

attributes.title: Terrible App Not Worth Getting
attributes.review: App crashes. takes too long to download, dont respect the things and spam on this app. horrible app wasted my time and many others. this app is senseless and waste of phone storage and space. if I could rate no stars I would. worst app ever. Never again

attributes.title: Absolutely Horrid!
attributes.review: When I first opened the app, it asked for my phone number? Not only is that an invasion of privacy but I do NOT feel comfortable with the President, a married man, having access to my personal phone number. It‚Äôs disgusting and wrong. Save yourself some time and do not get this app.

I lost all my vision and now have to have a seeing eye dog to help me get around. I can‚Äôt believe that they would put such a horrid creature on the app. It is really so disgusting.

attributes.title: Crashes
attributes.review: Okay so I downloaded this app really thinking that I wanted to check it out ya know. But it‚Äôs super glitchy. It freezes up and causes my phone to crash every time I go on it. Not to mention there‚Äôs some racist content on there that I wasn‚Äôt prepared for. Terrible user experience!

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: I‚Äôm not apart of the younger generation who is trying to take down the app. I was just trying to see what kind of things that our president was saying. It took four hours to download the app and it crashes more than most apps would crash.

attributes.title: Unhelpful information
attributes.review: Basically just the news you see if you watch the news no exclusive information or plans for his re-election that aren‚Äôt already known very disappointing, also no way to directly state your agreement or disagreements with plans.

attributes.title: disappointed.
attributes.review:
i downloaded this app with every intention to support my perfect and black/hispanic supporting president. yes all i got was a terrible app. it works slow, spends was too much money on the military, has a corrupted law enforcement, and only lets white users get add-ons. i was very disappointed by this. please do better.
Sincerely,
a member of Gen-Z

attributes.title: Lack of info
attributes.review: It is clear that who ever runs this app does not keep up with the content. It takes about 48 hours for the ‚Äúnew‚Äù news to be place on the app. By then we have already been made aware from other news outlets. I do not recommend this app.
